subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Jeannie Longo of France, generally considered the greatest female cyclist, withdrew from the Road World Championships after her husband’s suspension over allegations he bought the performance-enhancing blood booster EPO.
snippet: Jeannie Longo of France, generally considered the greatest female cyclist, withdrew from the Road World Championships after her husband’s suspension over allegations he bought the performance-enhancing blood booster EPO.
